title: Nuwani Palihawadana
text: Nuwani Palihawadana PhD Student in Statistics Department of Econometrics & Business Statistics Monash University, Australia.

title: About Me
text: I am a PhD student at Monash University, Australia, supervised by Professor Rob J. Hyndman, Dr Christoph Bergmeir, and Professor Louise M. Ryan. I am currently working on a project titled “Optimal Predictor Selection for High-dimensional Nonparametric Forecasting”.

title: About Me
text: I am currently a PhD student at Monash University, Australia supervised by Prof. Rob J. Hyndman, Dr. Christoph Bergmeir, and Prof. Louise M. Ryan.
